General.Name: Eo2 Société Anonyme
General.Description: Eo2 Société Anonyme designs, produces, and distributes wood heating products under the EO2 and PIKS brands in France. It offers wood pellets, distri'pellets, densified wood logs, and bulk wood pellets. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Malakoff, France.
